full_description: Use one arm to grasp the microphone on the table and handover it to the other arm
schema: {A} notifies the microphone, {a} notifies the arm to grab the microphone, {b} notifies the arm to hand over to
preference: num of words should not exceed 15

template_example.visual_state_description: I can see a microphone on the right of a table.
template_example.reasoning_and_reflection: It's the beginning of the task. The assistant info provides the initial position to place temporarily for handover. I will use them to handover the mic. The mic is on the right side, so I will grasp it first with right arm. After placing it to the middle initial position, I will use right arm to grasp it.
template_example.language_plan: I will use right arm to grasp the mic first. And then lift it up to avoid collision with the other objects and adjust its posture. After that, I will place it to middle initial position according to assistant info. After that, I will use another left arm to grasp the microphone.

parameters.z: ...(SOME FLOAT VALUE THROUGH YOUR OBSERVATION AND THINKING)...
